FuncDef: This command displays the HQoS aggregate rate limit per port or Vport.
CLIs: port <port-id> queue-group <queue-group-name> [ egress ] [ access | network ] [ instance <instance-id> ] [ detail ]

ParaDef.Info: Displays information about the specified queue group on the port.
Displays HQoS aggregate rate limit information on an access port.
Displays HQoS aggregate rate limit information on a network port.
Specifies the identification of a specific instance of the queue-group. Values-1 to 65535.
Displays HQoS aggregate rate limit information for the specified Vport.
